about: Welcome to my professional portfolio! I'm Ashish Kumar Sahu, as a driven and analytical finance professional, I am Ashish Kumar Sahu. With a strong foundation in financial analysis, investment strategy, and risk management, I drive business growth through data-driven insights and strategic decision-making. My educational background includes a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration from a reputed university, and I have gained valuable experience through internships with XYZ Corporation and ABC Bank. I am proficient in financial statement analysis, ratio analysis, and financial modeling, and am currently pursuing the Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) program. I am confident in my ability to provide actionable insights that drive business outcomes
